definitions.definition: Any of very many vines , in North America and elsewhere, of the genus Passiflora that bear edible fruit called passion fruit , and showy flowers of a structure symbolic of the Passion of Christ .

main_definition: Any of very many vines , in North America and elsewhere, of the genus Passiflora that bear edible fruit called passion fruit , and showy flowers of a structure symbolic of the Passion of Christ .
